description:
Collagen Peptides is made with hydrolysed, predigested collagen from beef, chicken, fish and eggshell protein. The powder also contains an enzyme mix of protease and serrapeptase.


	Types of collagen included: Type I-II-III-IV-V and X
	Grass-fed beef, wild-caught cod, cage-free chicken and eggshell membranes


Recommended use:


	Dissolve 1 scoop (10.5 g) or 2 scoops (21 g) in water or juice. The powder can be added to cold or hot liquids, or a recipe of your choice.


Note:


	Collagen Peptides is made from animal raw materials and is not suitable for vegetarians.

Collagen is a protein that provides structure that our bodies produce less and less of as we age. The Collagen Complex by Nature Love cleverly combines hyaluronic acid, biotin, selenium, zinc, vitamin C and silicon – without any unnecessary additives.


	With 1000 mg collagen hydrolysate and 200 mg sodium hyaluronate.


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily with sufficient liquid and preferably with a meal.
	The pack will last two months if you follow the recommended use. 


Note:


	Not suitable for pregnant and breastfeeding people, children or adolescents.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
The Collagen C ReLift capsules contain a patented BioCell Collagen® formula. Contained in 2 capsules are the following amounts of collagen type ll, hyaluronic acid and chondroitin:


	65% hydrolysed collagen
	20% chondroitin sulfate and
	10% hyaluronic acid


Recommended use:


	Take 2 capsules daily with sufficient liquid.

In addition to high-quality collagen, the Cartilage Complex capsules by verteben also contain vitamin C, hyaluronic acid, glucosamine and bamboo extract.


	The product was developed by experts, is patented and has a unique  composition.


Recommended use:


	During the first two weeks, the manufacturer recommends taking 2 capsules twice a day with some liquid, preferably with a main meal.
	After the first two weeks, take 1 to 2 capsules a day over a longer period of time.
	The manufacturer also recommends taking the supplement over a period of at least 3 months.


Please note:


	If necessary, the capsules can also be opened and the contents mixed with other foods.
	People who are pregnant or breastfeeding, children and people taking coumarin anticoagulants should only take vertebene® Cartilage Complex after consulting a doctor or pharmacist.

features: With vitamin C, zinc and copper
description:
Hyaluronic acid is an endogenous compound and has a high water binding capacity. 1 g of hyaluronic acid can bind up to 1 litre of water. The new formula contains ceramide from peaches

Recommended use:


	Dissolve 1 measuring spoon (1.4 g) in 150 ml of liquid. Drink 2 times a day. Stir briefly and drink as soon as the powder has dissolved.


Please note:


	The turquoise blue little balls are copper in the form of copper gluconate. Copper gluconate naturally has a blue colour.

High-dose collagen and high-dose hyaluronic acid are combined with chondroitin and the amino acid L-lysine in these capsules. 


	Collagen contains many amino acids and is sourced from France for this product.
	Hyaluronic acid binds a lot of water.
	Chondroitin is a component of cartilage, bones and connective tissue.
	The essential amino acid lysine is involved in building collagen.


The capsules are made in Vitamaze quality and are produced exclusively in Germany according to the HACCP concept. The capsules are free from genetically modified ingredients, pesticides, fungicides, artificial fertilizers and other harmful substances.

Recommended use: 


	Take 2 capsules daily with 1-2 glasses of water (300-400 ml).


Notes: 


	Not suitable for children or teens.
	Consult a doctor before consuming food supplements during pregnancy or while breastfeeding.
	There is a risk of suffocation for consumers who have difficulty swallowing or who do not drink enough water.

features: With trace elements and caviar extract
description:
This collagen drink by Life Light contains high-quality fish collagen supplying the body with all the essential and nonessential amino acids. In addition, it was enriched with 10 vitamins and 5 minerals. The extra plus supplements contains caviar extract for a healthy appearance without having to use a luxury cream.

Flavour: Black currant

Recommended use:


	Stir 2 scoops (10g powder) daily into 100-200 ml of water and drink.

Collagen of animal origin is obtained from cattle farming that is massively damaging to the environment. To avoid collagen of animal origin, anatis has developed the Pro Collagen Vegan, a sophisticated formulation of carefully selected nutrients. The vegan amino acids L-lysine, glycine and L-proline are the basic ingredients and are optimised with natural vitamin C from acerola and Tremella mushroom. Furthermore, it contains oat drink powder and can be mixed into a drink with a pleasant taste.


	Contents 360 g = 60 sachets of 6 g each


Preparation:
Pour the contents of 1 sachet into a glass. Add cold to lukewarm water and stir. Do not use hot water as heat can cause the ingredients to degrade.

Recommended consumption:
1 sachet twice per day after meals.
At the recommended dosage, 1 pack contains a sufficient supply for 1 month.

description:
The UNDO Collagen drink contains Naticol® (a natural source of Type I fish collagen peptides), blueberry extract (a natural source of anthocyanins) and vitamin C.

Recommended use:


	After the meal, dissolve 1 sachet per day in a glass of water and drink.


Please note: this product is not recommended for pregnant or nursing women.

The Grass-fed Collagen Powder by nu3 stands out from others because it is obtained from cattle that are fed with grass or hay all year round. nu3 sources the collagen from European pasture-fed cattle to avoid long transport routes. The powder contains collagen types I - V and is a high-quality source of protein. Gentle extraction using enzymes ensures that it dissolves easily in cold and warm liquids and does not gel. It is free from additives such as flavours, sweeteners, colours and preservatives and is tasteless and odourless.

Recommended use: 10 g daily. Stir into shakes, smoothies or juice and enjoy.

description:

Take 1 capsule twice a day or as directed by a doctor

Note:

description:
Collagen is one of the body's structural proteins. Bioactive Collagen is a collagen supplement derived from hydrolysed bovine collagen source from cattle in Germany.

It has a very low molecular mass and each serving provides free amino acids and small peptides.
The practical powder makes it easy to take as it can be stirred into both hot and cold drinks.

Recommended use:
Stir 2 level measuring spoons of the powder into 240 ml of water, juice or smoothie once a day day and drink.

description:
This vanilla-flavoured vegan protein powder contains all the essential components for collagen formation. Each serving provides 11 g of protein from a total of 21 different broad-spectrum amino acids.

Recommended use:


	Mix 14 g (1 scoop) in sufficient liquid.
	Can be added directly to food.

description:
The BIOBENE® Collagen Complex contains an optimally balanced composition of collagen peptides, biotin, vitamin C, copper and other valuable ingredients. The total of 7 active vital substances forms a high-quality product that is made completely without sugar.

Benefits of the BIOBENE® Collagen Complex:


	Copper contributes to the maintenance of normal connective tissue
	Vitamin C contributes to normal collagen formation for normal skin function
	Biotin contributes to the maintenance of normal skin



Made without...


	... lactose or milk components
	... yeast, iodine or gluten


Recommended use:


	Dissolve 1 sachet daily in approx. 200 ml of water and take over a period of at least 4 weeks.

features: A patented form of hydrolysed, native collagen
description:
Collagen Flex + Powder is based on a patented formula of hydrolysed native collagen. The powder also contains hyaluronic acid, silicon and vitamins. Sugar and other sweeteners have been completely omitted. The powder is especially recommended for older or overweight people or all those who put a lot of strain on their joints and spine during sports or everyday work.

Recommended intake:
Recommended daily dose 1 measuring cup (5.5 g). Dissolve the powder in 1.5 dl of water and drink. Regular use over at least 12 weeks is recommended by the manufacturer. Suitable for continuous daily use. The powder is recommended on an empty stomach.

Advice:


	Use is not recommended for people who are allergic to any of the ingredients.
	Store in a dark and dry place at a temperature of up to 25 ° C and use within 2 months after first opening.

In addition to valuable vitamins and trace elements, the Chondro Aktiv capsules also contain plant-based ingredients such as black pepper and curcuma. The UC-II® collagen in the capsules is patented and extremely valuable. 

The capsules are particularly interesting for athletes. 

Recommended use:


	Take 2 x 1 capsule per day with meals.

This food supplement is high in vitamin C which contributes to normal collagen formation for normal cartilage function. MSM, chondroitin sulphate and glucosamine support this function.

Recommended dose:
Take 1 sachet daily between meals. Dissolve the contents of the sachet in about 200 ml water and drink.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
The practical drink ampoules by nu3 contain high-quality Collagen Beauty Elixir - your new secret weapon for beautiful glowing skin. The marine collagen is particularly easy to absorb thanks to hydrolysis. The innovative formula is ideally complemented with selenium, vitamin E, biotin and zinc. It contains vitamin C that contributes to normal collagen formation for normal skin function. The 2-phase complex protects the nutrients until consumption and has a fresh, fruity raspberry and cherry flavour.

Recommended dose:


	Drink one ampoule in the morning with breakfast
	Twist the cap to release the powder and shake the ampoule vigorously to dissolve the powder in the liquid.

attributes.name: Storage Advice
attributes.value: Store in a cool, dry place away from light

description:
No. 30 Constructor (Human) contains a coordinated complex of collagen hydrolysate, chondroitin sulphate and hyaluron in a red wine, grape seed & rosehip melange and has been optimised with vitamin C.


	Collagen hydrolysate from beef
	Chondroitin sulphate from beef
	Hyaluronic acid from plant origin as sodium hyaluronate


Recommended intake:
2 to 4 capsules per day. Consume with plenty of liquid after or with food.

In addition to the encapsulated turmeric extract CAVACURMIN®, the collagen flex curcumin capsules also contain hyaluronic acid, silicon and vitamins (C & D).

Recommended consumption:
The recommended daily dose is two capsules. Swallow the capsules with sufficient water. Enjoy Collagen Flex Curcumin on an empty stomach.

Notes:


	If signs of hypersensitivity occur, you should stop using the product.
	Store in a dark and dry place up to 25 °C.

In addition to providing liquid collagen from fish, the Collagene Marino PRO also contains many valuable amino acids. Hyaluronic acid, vitamins C, E and B6 are also included in the product.

Recommended use:


	Take 1 vial per day after eating.


Note:


	12 bottles at 50 ml are included in delivery.

productTitle: Collagene Marino Beauty Box In & Out, 10,000 mg
description:
Hyaluronic acid and vitamins E, C and B6 make the Collagene Marino Beauty Box In & Out an absolute must-have! The box includes 1 x Hydrolised Marine Collagen Liquid and 1 x Marine Collagen Facial Serum. The impressive, synergistic formula of the Marine Collage has a nice orange flavour. The Marine Collagen Facial Serum contains green tea extract (perfect for cases of acne) and cooling aloe vera. 


	The collagen used for the products comes from fish. 


Recommended use: Hydrolised Marine Collagen: 


	Take 25 ml between meals each day. 


Recommended use: Marine Collagen Facial Serum


	Massage the serum onto your face after cleansing. Use circular movements to massage the serum into your face, neck and décolleté. 


Notes: after opening the Hydrolised Marine Collagen, store it in the refrigerator and drink within a month.

The vertical intensive program is a 6 week training program and includes the following:


	1x the 120 pcs. Pack of BS capsules
	1x back oil
	1x training DVD
	1x instruction booklet


BS - capsules from verteben:


	They contain, among other things, valuable bamboo extract and vitamin C. The product developed by experts is subjected to regular controls by certified test centers in Austria and Germany.
	Recommended dosage: take 2-3 capsules daily (2x1 or 3x1) with or after a meal with plenty of liquid.


Back oil from vertebrae:


	It is based on St. John's wort extract and contains additional olive oil, essential oils and cedar oil.
	Application: Massage the back gently and evenly with the oil. Only for external use! Avoid eye contact.


Training DVD & instruction booklet:


	The training program was put together in such a way that 2 training units of 35 minutes each per week should be implemented.

productTitle: Pure & Essential Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides, 400 g
description:
The Pure & Essential Advanced Hydrolysed Collagen Peptides is an enzymatically hydrolysed collagen protein powder.


	100% from certified, grass-fed free-range cattle
	The cattle are subject to regular veterinary monitoring and medical care and are not given any industrial feed, routine antibiotics or steroids
	Each batch is fully traceable and is tested for heavy metals while meeting strict purity standards
	Contains collagen types 1, 2 and 3
	High bioavailability, purity and good solubility without clumping
	Compatible with paleo, keto and kosher diets
	Odourless and tasteless
	Comes in a bag made of a 100% recyclable eco-friendly bag. 


Recommended use:


	Add 10 g (1 measuring spoon) to liquid (cold or warm).
	Can be added directly to food.

description:

The Pure & Essential Advanced Vegan Pro-Collagen is a unique protein powder made from brown rice, peas, pumpkin and sunflower seeds. It offers an ideal ratio of the main amino acids hydroxyproline, proline and glycerine (1: 1: 2). The vegan powder has been enriched with the collagen cofactor vitamin C.

description:
These tablets contain an innovative formulation of glucosamine and chondroitin obtained from the shells of crustaceans and from the cartilage of wild fish. The formulation is refined with vitamin C, copper and devil's claw (Harpagophytum procumbens). Practical and easy in everyday life.

Recommended dose:


	Take 3 tablets once a day with breakfast with a large glass of water.
	It is recommended to take the tablets for 1 month.


Note:


	Not recommended for pregnant or breastfeeding women.
	Not recommended for children and adolescents under 15 years of age.
	Not recommended if you have stomach or duodenal ulcers and gallstones.
	Contains traces of iodine.
	Not recommended for people with diabetes, prediabetic, asthma, and anticoagulants.
	Not recommended for people allergic to shellfish.

This collagen powder scores extra points with its refreshing watermelon taste. It contains vitamins B and C. The easy-to-use, gluten-free powder can be added to drinks or shakes.

Recommended use:


	We recommend adding one to two teaspoons (approx. 10 g) of Purasana Collagen to a glass of water, juice or smoothie


Please note:


	The collagen contained in the watermelon flavour comes from beef.

Hydrolyzed collagen is the most abundant protein in the human body and makes up 70-95% of the cartilage structure. GoPrimal uses the adequately split form of collagen with valuable vitamin C. The combination is completely tasteless and can be added to any cold or hot drink.

Recommended use:


	Simply add 10 g of powder to 200 ml water, coffee or any other beverage and stir.


Note:


	If you are pregnant or are planning a pregnancy, please consult your doctor before use.
	If you are taking medication, please consult your doctor before taking this supplement.

Collagen of animal origin is obtained from cattle farming that is massively damaging to the environment. To avoid collagen of animal origin, Dr. Ehrenberger has developed the Pro Collagen Vegan, a sophisticated formulation of carefully selected nutrients. The vegan amino acids L-lysine, glycine and L-proline are the basic ingredients and are optimised with natural vitamin C from acerola and Tremella mushroom. Furthermore, it contains oat drink powder and can be mixed into a drink with a pleasant taste.


	Contents: 360 g = 60 sachets of 6 g each


Preparation: 
Pour the powder into a glass, add cold to lukewarm water and stir. Do not use hot water as heat can cause the ingredients to degrade.

Recommended intake:
1 sachet twice per day after meals.
At the recommended dose, one pack (60 sachets) contains a sufficient supply for 1 month.

Recommended intake: 10 g per day. Stir into shakes, smoothies or juice and enjoy.

description:
Collagen from marine fish is rich in protein and omega-3 fatty acids.

Recommended use:


	Take 1-2 capsules daily with plenty of fluid. Take preferably with meals.

This purely vegetable powder contains many vitamins. It consists of the following ingredients:


	Rice bran: It is obtained in Thailand.
	Pea protein: The protein from peas contains 9 essential amino acids.
	Tremella: This mushroom contains antioxidants.
	Lucuma: This versatile fruit impresses with a particularly large number of nutrients such as vitamin C, zinc and fibre.
	Vanilla: The vanilla powder is obtained from Madagascar. It contains many vitamins and minerals.
	Aloe Vera: A succulent plant extracted in China that contains many amino acids.


Use:
Add 2 teaspoons of Plant Collagen to smoothies, oatmeals and lattes.

Recipe idea: Glowing Skin Smoothie


	2 tsp Plant Collagen Mix
	1 tsp Forever Beautiful Mix
	3-4 pitted dates
	250 ml of water or plant-based milk
	50 g frozen blueberries
	2 tbsp almond butter
	Ice cubes



	Put all ingredients in a blender and mix until creamy.
	Pour into a glass and enjoy!

description:
Collagen is the most abundant protein in the human body, makes up 25% of body structure and is a component of all ligaments, cartilage, skin, hair and nails. From the age of 20, the process of collagen formation in the body slows down.


	Hydrolyzed type I collagen and is obtained from fish scales
	Marine collagen works great in combination with vitamin C


Consumption recommendation:
Take 2 capsules daily before a meal with plenty of liquid.

The flavourful Collagen Powder Zero contains 0% fat. Instead, it contains valuable vitamin C, an exciting amino acid profile, essential amino acids and a lot of collagen hydrolysate - over 80%! The collagen hydrolysate is sourced from cattle and is of the highest quality.

Recommended use:


	Add 12 g powder and 300 ml water to a shaker and shake for 20 seconds. 


Note:


	May contain traces of egg, gluten, lupine, milk and soy.

Collagen - activated with L-lysine, L-glycine, magnesium carbonate, L-proline and hyaluronic acid.

features: With MSM, vitamin C, magnesium & manganese
description:
Flex Collagen contains a carefully selected and synergistic combination of ingredients:


	Hydrolysed collagen, which is broken down into smaller particles (peptides) through a special process, which allow the body to absorb it more easily
	Type II collagen, which is found in cartilage, joints, and interstitial fluid
	MSM (methyl sulfonyl methane), also known as a beauty mineral because it is present in the skin and is also an essential component in the production of collagen and connective tissue
	Vitamin C, Magnesium and Manganese


Consumption recommendation:
2 drinks daily. For a drink, mix 1 measuring spoon of powder (approx. 7.7g) in 250ml of water.

features: A high dose of 5000 mg of collagen per portion

Recommended use:


	Take 25 ml daily, preferably between meals.
	After opening store in the refrigerator

The UNDO Nutrishine is equally dedicated to your hair and nails and is a perfectly matched 2 in 1 product. The recipe includes high-quality ingredients like creatine and zinc.

	Take 1 capsule per day, after meals with plenty of water. 


Notes:

	Do not store below 25 ° C

The youth elixir!

Collagen + Vitamin C Liquid has a delicious taste of ripe, juicy mirabelle plums so that every sip becomes a taste experience.


	It supplies pre-split, collagen protein chains (hydrolysate) with a high biological value, which can be used more quickly and completely by the body.
	As a liquid, the supply of collagen is therefore also more effective in the long term than collagen creams or lotions.
	And that without sugar and free of any allergens.


Consumption recommendation:
Take 25ml Collagen Liquid daily. Shake well before drinking.

features: A carefully selected combination of ingredients
description:
The beverage powder consists of a carefully selected combination of ingredients to support the skin and hair:


	Hydrolysed collagen, which is broken down into smaller particles (peptides) using a special process
	Patented collagen Verisol®, which was specially developed for the needs of skin, hair and nails
	Hyaluronic acid, which is naturally present in the skin and has an exceptional water retention capacity
